div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxj die mensis
Maij Anno quo supra

The saide day the court wardit schew for law and It was gevin for dome that
Williame scot mastir vndir gode of ane schip callit bonaventour' hed' preuit
Sufficientlie that Duncan colysone was aving to him xxxviij s' scottis money
and patry Rede xxij s' and ix d' for fraucht

Eodem die Willelmus Scot fecit constituit creauit et nominauit gilbertum menyeis
suum legittimum et Indubitatem procuratorem dans et concedens eidem suam liberam et omnimodam
potestatem et mandatum speciale pro se et nomine suo ad respondendum Duncano Colison'
et patricio Rede in omnibus et Similiter actionibus et causis quod ipsum per eosdem
proponendum Agendum defendendum prosequendum et cetera Ac omnia alia faciendum
promittens de Rato et grato in vberiore forma procuratorij Cum ceteris clausulis
necessariis et oportunis

Eodem die Dauid mar Junior fecit constituit creauit et nominauit gilbertum menyes Johannem
mar et henricum Rede coniunctim et diuisim suos viros legittimos Indubitates procuratores dans
et con concedens eisdem ac eorum cuilibet suam liberam potestatem mandatum speciale
pro se et nomine suo breue capelle Regie debite executorem et deseruicium mandarj
per balliuos et assisam desuper eligendum et cetera Retornatam ad capellam regiam Remittere
litteramque sasine desuper Impetrare sasinam terre sua recipere eandem Resignatum vendere
et alienare pro solucione sue partis xxvj li' xvj s' et viij d' pro Releuacione gilberti
menyes ad manus georgei eduardson' Ceteram omnia et singula facere et exteriore
promittens de Rato et grato in vberiore forma procuratorij Cum ceteris clausulis
necessariis et oportunis

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxiii die mensis maij
anno quo supra

The saide day george talyour was conuict' be ane Suorne assis' Dauy
menyeis forspekar for trubulance of William laysk for the quhilkis he was in ane
amerciament of the court et cetera and tile amend' as law wile and forber' in tym' to Cum for the
quhilkis the saide assis' deliuerit for the Amendis that the saide george sal Sytt
done one his kneys and ask the saide William laysk and William laysk his
fadir and pray the aldirman and balyeis to Requer' thame to Remitt tham Ande that
the saide george sale cum one Sonday that nixt cumys the tyme of the hie mes'
and bringe with him ane candile weynge j li' of waxe and offir' to the thomas
Waus or Richerde Waus in the honor' of gode and the haly blud licht ande
Sanct nicholes Ande gif euere the saide george jappinis tile tribule the saide
William or ony vthir and beis conuict tharof in tyme to Cum he sale pay xxtj s' to
Sanct nicholes werk vnforgevin

The saide Williame skynner was conuict be the saide assis' for the wranguis' haldin
of the parsone of crovdanis hors' within his hous' and withhaldin of the key of
his butht dur' fra the officiar' quhen he come to ask the saide hors' be deliuerit
et cetera for the quhilkis he was in ane Amerciament of the Court et cetera

The saide day Johne leslie of warderis aldirman grantit to ger' pay to mastir William
Strathachin chaplan of Sanct Johne the baptistis altar xiij s' iiij d' of this
yeris aucht to him be the towne Ande exponit opinly ande declarit that
Alexander menyeis hede grauntit to mak him be pait of the xl s' aving
to him of his annuell assignit to him be the toune of Abirdene of thar
myllis yerlie for the annuell aucht to the said' chaplanry

The said' day It was fundin and deliuerit that Elizabetht clat sale pay to
Androw Johnesone hir' yeris fee samekle as
becaus' scho feyt hir' with him to make him seruice and wald nocht entir'
and mycht nocht keipe hir' condicioun' becaus' scho was feit obefor

The said' day margaret Stile spous' to Williame harpar grantit hir
aving to Johne flessor vij s' quhilkis the ballieis chargit hir' to
pay within terme of law

The said day thomas leslie exponit and schew to the balyeis how that he hed'
complenyet to thame obefor that sere Johne ruthirfurde hed' tribulit him and Requerit
thame to warne him to this day that he mucht haue Remede of lawe Ande
thomas Waus saide he hed' warnit the said' knicht to Comper befor the
balyeis this saide day tile vndirlie the law Ande thareftir causit the officiaris
to call him to entir befor thame quhilkis thris' callit and nocht comperit
The saide' thomas offerit him redy tile vndirlie the law in ony thingis
that the said' knicht hed' to say tile him and to haue law of him befor the
saide balyeis his Juge ordinar protestande for Remede of law tyme and place
quhar' It efferis

The saide day the Court wardit schewe for law and It was gevin for
dome that Johne falconer hede falyeit in his preiwe that the Comptour'
and fiwe treis clamyt be thomes chamer pertenit to him and he hed' ane
warand' for the Samyn

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiudem vicesimo sexto die mensis
maij Anno quosupra

Inquisicio facta apud burgum de Abirdene vicesimo sexto die mensis Maij Anno
Domini millesimo quingentesimo quinto coram honorabilibus viris Johanne lesly de
Warderis preposito thoma lesly et thoma Waus duobus balliuorum burgj de Abirdene
in pretorio eiusdem in curia balliuorum protribunali sedens per subscriptum videlicet
Alexandrum menyeis Dauid menyeis alexander reid' Johanne cullan Johanne mar
Dauid mar Johanne Ratre alexandrum gray Duncanum collisone Andream fyff Johannem
andersone Johannem moir et Dauid symne burgenses dictj burgj Qui Jurati
dicunt quod quondam Johannes mar frater Dauid latoris presencium obijt vltimo vestitus
et sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem dominj nostrj Regis de quadam terra anteriore
Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico le gastraw ex occidentali parte eiusdem vicj
inter terram quondam Johannis Knollis ex australi ex vna et terram quondam Dauid
spens ex borealj partibus ab altera et communionem viam regiam versus oriens et terram Interiore quondam Alexander King versus occidens Et
torrentem sine aqueductum ad molendinum supremis dictj burgj distenden' versus
occidens Et quod dictus Dauid est legittimis et propinquior heres dictj quondam
Johannis fratris suj de dicta terra anteriore sum suis pertinencijs Et quod est legittime etatis
Et quod dicta terra cum pertinencijs valet nunc per annuum quinque s' Et valet tempore pacis xl d'
tempore pacis Et quod tenetur in capite de domino nostro rege per seruicium burgagium
Et nunc existit in manibus domini nostrj regis per spacium sex decim Annorum aut eocirca
in defectu verj heredis Jus suum huiusque minime prosequentis Reseruato tantum per omnia
Elizibeth blinseill Relicta quondam dictis Johannis libero tenemento eiusdem terre
cum pertinenciis pro toto tempore vite sue Datis et clausis et cetera

The saide day thomas leslie tuk to preiwe the fische debatable
betuix the cavele that he Is in et cetera and the cawele that Jonhne blak and
Dauy ar' in of the Pott wattir pertenis to thar cavele one friday that
next cumis

Iidem Jurati dicunt quod quondam Dauid spens patruus Johannis spens latoris
presencium obijt vltimo vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini
nostrj Regis de dimidietate vnius terre cum suis pertinenciis Jacente infra dictum burgum in
le gastraw ex occidentali parte eiusdem vicj inter terram quondam thome marr
ex australi ex vna et terram quondam magistri alexandri Waus ex boreali partibus
ab altera et communionem viam regiam versus oriens et torrentem sine aqueductum
molendinorum versus occidens Et quod dictus Johannes est legittimis et pro
pinquior heres dictj quondam Dauid patruj suj de dicta dimidietas terre cum
pertinenciis Et quod est legittime etatis Et quod dicta dimidietate terre valet nunc
per annum decim solidos Et valuit quinque solidos tempore pacis Et quod tenetur
in capite de suppremo domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium Et nunc
existit in manibus domini nostrj Regis per renunciatorum et dimissionem coniuncte Infeodacionis eiusdem terre cum pertinenciis per mariotam
burnat Relictam quondam dicti Dauid sprute factas per spacium vnius mensis aut eocirca aut
eocirca in defectu verj heredis Jus suum huiusque minime prosequentis datis et cetera

The saide day ormund leslie grantit to pay to alexander pantoun' of
tulimad sex schillingis of Siluyr at lammes that nixt cummys

The saide day myche the sawar' falyeit in his preiwe that he tuk
to preiwe thre s' clamyt be mastir Dauy menyeis pait Ande aw to
pay the samyn to the said' mastir Dauy

Eodem die thomas Coule conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ex ore Johannis mar'
prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Agnetis Randy et domus Andree louson' quibus eme
dabit ut Jura volunt

head.add: meg hay wif to Johne meldrum

div.p:
The saide day margaret hay spous' to Johne of meldrum was in ane
amerciament of the court for the wranguis' closin of the durris of the hous' quhilk
Johne of mydiltone Inhabit pertening to Arthour andirson' Ande for dissobeing
of ormond' leslie William scrimgeor and gilbert prestone thre of the seriandis of the
said' burghe in the execucioun' and doing of thar office be hir' avne tovng
graunt Ande scho tile amend' as law wile and forber' in tym' to Cum

The saide day margaret hay spous' to Johne of meldrum was in Ane
amerciament of the court be hir' avne tong gravnt for the comtempcioun of the
aldirman thomas Waus balye and of the towne in casting of Richt wile
fyltht out of the stair' of the saide hous' at the saide seriandis in tyme of the
execucioun of thar officis et cetera and scho tile Amende as law wile and forber'
in tym' to cum

The saide day Williame Wormet become Souerte be his hand tile entir'
margaret hay one friday that next Cumis befor the aldirman and balyeis
within the tolbutht in hour' of caus' thar tile vndirly the consale Anent
the Amendis for the said' demeritis Ande scho oblist hir' be hir hand to
freith the said' William of his said' borougang

head.add: penes bona Jure hereditario Dauid blinsele pertinenciis

div.p:
Cuira balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxvij die mensis
maij anno quo supra

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis ordanit chargit and directit thomas
Waus ane of the ballieis of the saide burghe to pas' with Dauy blinsele
and kene him to the gudis of airschip being within his avne hous' that ar'
oppin' vnlokit pertening to him be deces' of vmquhile Robert blinsele his
fadir quhome god assolye

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem penultimo
die mensis maij anno quo supra

The said' day James allirdes grantit he hed' set the hous' quhar' William scrogis
duellis to Sandy findelawe

The saide day patry chernside grauntit he hed' tane ane Cultir and Sok out
of Dauy Symmis pleucht

the saide day the borghe' fundin one Robert Walcar' be Johne of gordone for
wranguis' done castyn' distroing and Skathing of ane hous' pertening to
patry Duncansone in banf was fundin of nayn' avale for the
quhilkis the saide Johne was in ane Amerciament of the Court and the saide
Robert quyt of the saide clame

Eodem die Compertum fuit per Inquisicioni Curie quod Robertus Kyntor est legittimis
et propinquior heres quondam Agnetis thomsone matris sue

The siade day the aldirman and ballieis assignit tuysday that nixt Cumis to patry
leslie ane of the balyeis one that ane part Ande Johne Waus one that vthir part to
Comper befor thame one tuysday that next Cumis one the pece of land'
debatabile betuix thamme in the grene bringand' with thame sic Richtis and documentis
that thai haue and wile vys' in the saide matir for ministracioun of Justice in the samyn

The said' day It was fundin and deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' gilbert menyeis
forspekar that the Salmnode fische follouit be the spous' of Johne blak Dauy fynne
et cetera ane of the cauyllis of the furdis wattir of the pott was slane in the wattir
pertening to Thomas leslie Johne of Ratre and vthiris that nychtbouris and pertenis to
thame

Eodem die plegium porrectum thomam leslie super Andream Archebalde pro lace
racione suj dimidij Rethis validum suit in se per assisam Juratam ex ore
gilberti menyeis prelocutoris eiusdem pro quibus dictus Andreas fuit in Amerciamento Curie et emendabit
ut Jura volunt

Eodem die Andreas archebald' conuictus fuit per assisam Juratam ex ore prefati gilberti
prelocutoris eiusdem pro perturbio Johanis masone famuli Johanne Ratre Cuj emendabit
ut Jura volunt

The said' day It was fundin and deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' gilbert menyeis
forspekar that William scrogis hes nay tak nor assedacioun' of the hous' quhilkis
he Inhabitits and aw to deuoyde the samyn to Alexander findelaw tennent' tharto

The saide day James allirdes taxt Ilk day v s' of maile one his hous'
quhilkis William scrogis Inhabitit that he happinis tile Occupy It eftir this
day

The saide day Katherine of Cullan warnit callit and nocht Comperit tile ansuer
to the borghe' fundin one hir' be Androw burnat for the wranguis' haldin fra him
of xviij s' tharfor the balyeis ordanit William scrimgeor officiar' to pas' and tak distres'
of the saide Katherine and latt it to borghe' agane and It be askit and warnit hir'
to Comper one monunday that nixt cumis tile Ansuer' to the said' borghe'

Eodem die Robertus Waus deuenit plegius legalis per manus sue dextere
ostendem quod Dauid mar' Junior erit Indempnes pro eo patricio chernsid' aliter quam per viam Juris Et thomas
buchane deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus patricius chernside erit Indempnis
pro prefato Dauid aliter quam per viam Juris Et quod vtraque pars obligatur fide
media per manus sue dextere ostendem ad conseruandum suos plegios Indempnes
de huiusmodi fideiussione

The saide day margaret hay spous' to Johne of meldrum Comperit befor
the aldirman balyeis and counsal tile vndirlie thar ordinance for the demeritis
and dissobeing of the officiaris and contempcioun' done to the aldirman and the town'
efitr the tenor' of actis maide tharupoun' Obefor In the quhilkis the aldirman
and counsale Riply auisit ordanit and deliuerit that the saide margarete
sale Rede oppyn' and deuoyde the hous' quhilkis Johne of mydiltoun'
occupeit this yer' bigane in continent or scho pas' out of the tolbutht And'
fynde Sufficient Souerte tile entir befor the aldirman balyeis and counsale
within viij days hereftir and Souner gif hir' husband' cumys hayme
quhene euere scho beys Requirit be the officiaris of the toune tile vndirly
thar' ordinance In premiss'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem secundo
die mensis Junij Anno Millesimo supra quingentesimo quinto

The saide day in presence of Johne leslie of Warderis aldirman Johne cullan
Alexander Rede patry Rede Williame Wormet Androw meldrum Alexander malison'
and Androw nachtj seriand' It was fullie appontit and accordit betuix mastir
Alexander bissat possessor of ane Inlande liand in the vuirkirkgat one that ane
part Ande margaret of buchane possessor of the forlande of the samyn tenement
liand' betuix the lande of vmquhile Alexander stokar one the est part and the lande
of vmquhile Androw Scherar' one the west parte In manere and forme eftir follo
winge that is to say the saide mastir Alexander his ayris assignez or successouris
sale peciablie Joys' and bruk the saide Inlande foreuere without ony Impediment
or demavnd' of the saide margaret hir' ayris or assignez Ande the saide
margaret hir ayris or assignez sal foreuere mair' peciable Joys' and bruk the
saide forland' with the pertinence Reseruand' the foryet of the samyn with
fre vsche and entray to the saide mastir Alexander his ayris Successouris and
assignez perpetualy Ande the saide mastir Alexander sal pay be him his ayris
Successouris or assignez yerlie Ilkan yer fiwe schillingis and Sex pennis
of annuele to the perpetuale chapellane of Sanct elegiis altar and tua pennis
and ane half penny to the Rude malys alanerly for ale annuellis Rentis
and vthir thingis that may be askit or Requirit of the saide Inland' onywis'
In tyme to cum And' the said' margaret hir ayris and Assignez sal pay
yerlie ale vthir and Sundrie annuellis Rentis and Rude malys that may
be askit or Requirit of the said haill land' Inland' and forlande with
thir pertinence In tymes to Cum for the annuellis that ar' aucht of the saide
landis the day of the making of this Act' To the quhilkis to be obseruit
and kepit lelely ande treuly batht the said' partiis oblist tham thar ayris ande
assignez be the fathtis of thar bodiis thar' handis vphaldin befor thomas
Waus balye of the quhilkis the saide mastir Alexander askit Instrument of me
sere Johne Striueling notar and clerk of the Court
Johannes Striueling
Notarius manu propria

The saide day Thomas Watsone grantit hir' borghe' and dettour' to Androw
murray for xl s' and od' money vsuale money of Scotlande quhilkis
Is writin in the saide Androw murrayis buk for Johne low quhilkis
he suld' pay within terme of lawe

The saide day the balye at commavnde of the aldirman and assessoris of the
court with thar avis' ordanit Johne of meldrum to pay to Johne of mar'
procurator tile Arthour Andirson' the maile of the witsonday terme last bigane
of the lande quhilkis he Inhabitis within xxiij houris hereftir Ande falyeing
tharof the officiaris of the saide burghe' suld' punde and distrenye for the samyn

The saide day the aldirman and balyeis with avis' of the Court assignit friday
the sext day of the monetht of June next to Cum tile Johne of Meldrum
tile ansuer' to the borghe' fundin one him be Jonhne of mar' procurator tile
Arthour andirsone for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of the keys
of the hous' quhilkis he Inhabitis and the Witsonday maile of the sammyn
immediate bigane

Eodem die Johannes mar' procurator Arthurj Andirsone subscriuit fecit creauit et
nominauit patricium Rede patricium leslie Dauid blinsel and magistrum Jacobum coniunctim et diuisim
suos veros legittimos et Indubitates substitutos procuratores Actores factores et negociorum
Infrascriptorum gestores et cetera dans et concedens eisdem ac eorum Cuilibet suam liberam potestatem
et mandatum speciale ad prosequendum super eum aliis Johannem meldrum per eum porrectum
de et super iniusta detencione ab eo clameum et forma terminum penthecostes Immediate elapsis
de terra quam Inhabitat eidem Arthuro pertinenciis promittens de Rato et grato
Cum ceteris clausulis necessariis et oportunis

Eodem die patricius chernsid' fecit constituit creauit et nominauit Robertum Waus
suum legittimum et Indubitatem procuratorem actorem et factorem dans et concedens eidem suam liberam presentatem
ac mandatum speciale pro se et nomine suo prosequendum Dauid mar Judicatorem pro iniusta occupacione
vnius crofti et cetera Agendum defendum et cetera promittens de Rato et grato Cum
Ceteris clausulis necessariis et oportunis
